version_description:
1.New levels
Totally 15 new levels placed between Level 202 and level 216. More challenges are waiting for you.
2. Levels reset & Optimized
17 levels (From Level 2 to Level 18) have been redesigned and optimized, more challenging and fun!
3. Tower Enhance System Upgraded
3 more towers and 3 more magic items have been added to the enhancement list.
Now you have altogether 12 enhancement items/towers, each can be enhanced up to Lv.10.
4. Daily Task Introduced
A series of nice rewards await you in Daily Task.
5. UI Optimized
General optimizations have been made, making it more friendly.
6. Feedback function
New interface is set for players to feedback, where you can speak freely.
7. Minor bugs have been fixed.
minor bugs fixed
The problem that new Account appears after registering with WeChat  has been fixed.

1,New levels: Lv 217 to Lv 231
2,Degree optimized: Lowered the needed stars in following chapter lock
3,UI Optimized: General optimizations have been made, making it more friendly.
4,Others: some bugs have been fixed and some functions have been optimized

1. New levels (Lv.232-366) are introduced. The amount comes to 135 in total.
2. Player that shares his experience with friends can receive nice rewards.
3. The amount of stars that are used to unlock the chapter has been decreased.
4. The sharing layout has been optimized. And the new themes have been added.
5. Some minor bugs have been fixed.

1. New levels added: 45 more levels are added from Lv.367 to Lv.411.
2. Difficulty optimized: some levels become less hard.
3. New videos added: three-star strategy videos for passing levels from 232 to 411 are added.
4. More: bugs are fixed and functions optimized.

1.Energy restoration: Reduce the restoration of every point of Energy from 20 min to 10 min.Adjust the Energy drop on some levels.
2.New levels: Lv.412 to Lv.456, 45 new levels has been added into Guardians.
3.Difficulty optimization: Reduce difficulty on partial specific levels.
4.Function optimization：A new function has been added so that you can claim system rewards in your Inbox.
5.Interface optimization: Optimize the gaming experience when paused, and optimize the game UI of INBOX and Ranklist.
6.New videos: New videos of 3-full-star walkthrough tutorial has been added.
7.Others: Bug fixes and feature enhancements.

1. Difficulty optimization: Optimize difficulty on partial specific levels and reduce the requirements of stars for unlocking new level.
2. System optimization: Change the effects of partial Magic ITEMs.
3. Others: Bug fixes and issue optimizations.

● New Feature: Forum system has been added into this new version.
- Enter the Forum by touching the newly added button on Level intro.
- Post anything you want to say under the specific Levels.
● Issue optimization
- Reduce the challenge requirements of watching walkthrough videos from 5 times to 3 times.
- Failure ADs will not pop-up again within 15 min.
● New levels
- Lv.412 to Lv.456, 30 new levels has been added into Guardians.
● Difficulty optimization
- Optimize difficulty on partial specific levels and adjust the unlocking requirements on new episodes.
● Performance optimizations:
- Optimize the UI performances in Main screen, Level intros, HELP, TIPs and NEWs.
- Add new in-game animations for characters.
● Bug fixes and issue optimizations

● New levels：Lv.487 to Lv.496
● New Feature: Automatic translator
- The content of walkthrough tips will be translated automatically now.
● Issue optimization
- Make the Pop-Up rules of AD more friendly.
- Optimized the login rules between accounts.
● Difficulty optimization
- Optimize difficulty on partial levels.
● Performance optimization
- Optimized the partial UI performance in Guardians.
● Bug fixes and issue optimizations

● New Features:
- Medals: Medals will replace the achievement system in new version. Challenge yourself to get more medals. (PS: The rewards of achievement system will be dispersed into normal levels.)
- Elite Level: By overturning the original levels in both strategy and difficulty, Elite levels offer you an all-new all-different gaming experience. (Enter the Elite level by clicking the ELITE in level introduction.)

● New levels：
- Normal level: Lv.562 to Lv.581
- Elite level: Lv.1 to Lv.40

● Issue optimization
- Marquee Banner: Never miss a beat in main map with Marquee Banner.
- Optimized the rules in checking walkthrough comments.
- Optimized the rules in liking walkthrough comments.

● Difficulty optimization
- Optimize difficulty on partial levels.

● Performance optimization
- Optimized the appearance and visual effects of partial TOWERs and ITEMs.
- Optimized the partial UI performance in Guardians.

● Bug fixes and issue optimizations
minor bugs fixed

● New Features
- New Towers: Let me introduce you the newly added towers, Super Cannon and Sandbag!
- Bean System: Obtain beans by winning higher rank in levels. Exchange special Medals with beans.
- Enhancement System: The max enhancement level of 6 kinds of towers had been elevated to Lv.15.
● New levels
- Normal level: Lv.612 to Lv.641
- Elite level: Lv.81 to Lv.120
● Difficulty optimization
- Optimize difficulty on partial levels.
● Bug fixes and issue optimizations

1. 726 main levels are now available.
2. 270 elite levels are accessable for you to challenge.
3. Bug fixed.
minor bugs fixed

1. Remade Record system. Level walkthrough records from other players are accessible now.
2. Optimized the game process in levels when activated 2x speeds.
3. Adjusted the difficulty of intermediate levels and optimized some unreasonable values
4. Improved the performance of some turrets
5. Optimized painting of Buddle pages

1. Optimized the main map UI.
2. Optimized the event and activity button.
3. Reduced the pop up duration while entering a level.
4. Optimized the new-level-unlock requirements on both normal levels and elite levels.
5. Fixed the bug that prevents you from sharing game to Facebook and Twitter.
6. Fixed the crash problems on specific levels.

1. Optimized the Shop system.
2. Optimized the gaming experience of INBOX system.
3. Added new Packs and Bundles. Unlock them by level up.
4. Adjusted the unlock requirement for Elite Level.
5. Adjusted the difficulties for partial levels.
6. Fixed a random bug that causes the failure of unlocking levels.
7. Fixed the bug on partial items which lead to game crash.

1.New Features: The Starbox. Clear levels to collect stars and unlock the Starbox to claim useful props for FREE.
2.Hint: Added a glittering sign on important obstacles structures.
3.A new Prop: UnlimitedVitality. You're allowed to get this prop from Starbox.
4.You'll receive a reminder before entering a hard level now.
5.A special login Reward is ready for returning gamers only.
6.Blacken the fog of Blind Mode Level into totally darkness. The gaming experience in Blind Mode has been fully improved.

1. Remade Record system. Level walkthrough records from other players are accessible now.
2. Optimized the game process in levels when activated 2x speeds.
3. Adjusted the difficulty of intermediate levels and optimized some unreasonable values
4. Improved the performance of some turrets
5. Optimized painting of Buddle pages

1.Fixed a bug that item Portal cannot take effect.
2.Smoother running

1. Optimized the login process
2. Adjusted gold 3-star judging criteria of some levels
3. Fixed the bug that may cause crash
4. Fixed the bug the caused error in video system

● Bug Fixes
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.
improve game stability

It's an all-encompassing change, and a refreshing new version:
Newly designed Enhance and Ascend systems: all the Towers and Magic Items can be enhanced and ascended to gain more powerful abilities and unlock mysterious mutation effects on the battlefield!
Newly designed Activity system: Added Endless Level, Golden League and Daily Trial; with the existing "X" Map and Hidden Map, you can challenge yourself and dominate the world!
Added Treasure Chest: collect various resources and open the treasure chests to obtain rare props!
Added Store: regularly update the goods and there are also limited-time discounts!
Optimized Task system: Added main quest and optimized daily quest. Complete quests to gain rich rewards!
Redesigned Bag, Friend and Medal systems!
In addition, there are a lot of small optimizations waiting to be discovered! Download and experience now!
Fix bugs and improve game stability

Happy holiday!
Fix bugs and improve game stability

Added Lvl 1072- Lvl 1086
Optimized E-Shop interface
Fixed the bug that caused game crashing when some players watched videos

Main interface optimized
Battle settlement interface optimized
Difficulty adjusted
